titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 50th anniversary of the Combined Federal Campaign.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 229.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 11/16/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Commemorates the 50th anniversary of the Combined Federal Campaign.
